description:
Behind Bars - 1.0.4

Update to support game version f13

Expands the after-arrest experience in Schedule I with a complete criminal justice system:

• Full jail facility with booking process (mugshots, fingerprinting, cell assignment)
• Bail system with negotiation and payment mechanics
• Court system for plea bargaining and sentencing
• Parole system with officer patrols and random searches
• Dynamic prison NPCs (guards, inmates, intake/release officers)
• Crime tracking and wanted level display
• Time-based sentences with early release options
• Persistent player data across sessions
